ygData.subject: Languages and Learning...
ygData.msgSnippet: Right, we all need languages, and any learning is good. So, what I d like to do is set a date and have all the people interested in learning languages come and
ygData.messageBody:
Right, we all need languages, and any learning is good. So, what I'd like to
do is set a date and have all the people interested in learning languages
come and group spam each other.

Server: Solusek Ro
Date: Saturday May 22nd
Place: ?? Any suggestions? Nice open place where we don't have to show off
our nuking talents?
Time: Starting from 2pm EST till we all get tired and need to order pizza

Anyone interested please email me at kenlee@...

What I'd also like to do is form up groups of wizards afterwards to see if
we can effectively party in a 'wizard' only environment.
PAW is close by, and I'm sure that the commanders, elites, guards, and
gnolls would prove interesting fodder.

We can also discuss strategy, swap items, and all that other fun wizardly
stuff that the warriors and tanks just don't seem to get.... : )

Zalbar
18th Wizard
Solusek Ro
